Position Purpose - Mission





  


Within the data office team, she/he will support the deployment of applicable frameworks and guidelines across the Marketplace. She/he will orchestrate the functional guidelines and recommendations on Data Management considering business and regulatory requirements.

* Technology watch and proposal of plans to develop solutions, in particular by carrying out operational experiments.
